commandDescription: Auto-generate Apex classes from Swagger/OpenAPI definition files
flagPathDescription: URL or local file path for Swagger definition file
flagOutputdirDescription: local folder for storing the created files
flagApiversionDescription: specify the API version (defaults to API version of your DevHub)
flagForceDescription: A Java installation could not be found.
errorNoJavaInstallation: A Java installation could not be found.
errorNoDevHubConnection: Could not connect to the DevHub for fetching the API version.
errorClassGeneration: An error occurred during class generation.
